# List of abbreviations

```{r}
library('dplyr')
tibble(Abbreviation = c('HR', 'CTMM', 'GAM', 'HGAM'),
       Phrase = c('Home range', 'Continuous-time movement model', 'Generalized additive model', 'Hierarchical generalized additive model')) %>%
  arrange(Abbreviation) %>%
  knitr::kable(format = 'pipe') # simple
```
